CustomField.description: This number represents the number of points that will be deducted from the TaskRay Customer Onboarding Score when a Project deviates from its original schedule by a defined threshold.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Use this field to define the number of points that will be deducted from the TaskRay Customer Onboarding Score when a Project deviates from its original schedule by a defined threshold.
CustomField.label: Score Deduction
